english.segment1: Cold and wired. I've been fine. Everything you said to me goes well. Everything you said that you said. Said you see right through me. Could be pulling you to me. Nothing seems to be working. Throwing on my intentions on the..
english.segment2: All turn in one. Honesty waits here forever. I've been undone. Glory and us come together
english.segment3: Beautiful is my picture. Throw it up in the spotlight. This setting seems to be working. Throwing all my intentions on the..
english.segment4: All turn in one. Honesty waits here forever. I've been undone. Glory and us come together
english.segment5: And I'll see this through. Everything you said before. And I'll see this through
english.segment6: All tied in one. All tied in one
english.segment7: Everything changes the colours we see (All turn in one). Constant reminder of all that we should. Taking it back (All turn in one). Turning around (Glory and us come to..). Everything changes the colours we see (All turn in one). Constant reminder of all that we should (Honesty waits here forever). Turning around (I've been undone). Glory is waiting
